text: allah ivarkal anaivaraiyum (uyir kotuttu) eluppum nalilum (inraiya tinam) unkalitam avarkal cattiyam ceytataip ponru, allahvitattilum cattiyam ceytuvittu, niccayamakat tankal eto (tappittuk kollakkutiya oru nalla) kariyattaic ceytu vittatakavum ennik kolvarkal. Meyyakave ivarkaltan poyyarkalanro
